title: Venetia St, Sylvania Waters
content:
The goal was to preserve the original charm of the home while incorporating modern features that enhance both aesthetic appeal and functionality. This balance ensured the home remained timeless yet meeting the demands of a contemporary family.

Inhaus Living’s design approach focused on enhancing existing features while seamlessly integrating modern elements for a balanced, thoughtful transformation.

Open plan living
One of the main focuses was on opening the living spaces, by creating a more fluid layout. The home now enjoys maximised natural light and improved connectivity between indoor and outdoor areas. This change not only enhances the visual appeal but also promotes a sense of spaciousness and ease of movement throughout the home.

High-quality materials and finishes
Fixtures and finishes were carefully selected to reflect the owners design vision. High-quality materials ensure durability and longevity, while elegant finishes added a touch of luxury to everyday living. The combination of these elements results in a home that is beautiful as it is practical.

Preserving Architectural Integrity
While modern updates were added, the renovation kept the home’s original style intact. This way, it still has its unique character and charm, while feeling fresh and up to date.

The Venetia St renovation blends timeless charm with modern living. An open-plan layout floods the home with natural light and creates seamless indoor-outdoor flow, while high-quality finishes add subtle luxury. By preserving original architectural features, the home retains its unique character, resulting in a spacious, elegant, and family-friendly space.

Make an enquiry today with Inhaus Living.
